Module org.TRPGF
Package org.TRPGF

Class CharacterCreator

java.lang.Object
org.TRPGF.CharacterCreator
public class CharacterCreator extends Object
This class lets you decide on what will be on the character creator screen and what stats / attributes the character wil have and how the values are decided.

  • Method Details

    • getSingleInstance

      public static CharacterCreator getSingleInstance()
      This class lets you decide on what will be on the character creator screen and what stats / attributes the character wil have and how the values are decided.

    • addNameOption

      public void addNameOption()
      Adding the option for the player to choose a name

    • setName

      public void setName​(String name)
      If you want to decide the name of the player character Remember to not use this and addNameOption
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player character

    • addStat

      public void addStat​(String statName, int minValue, int maxValue)
      Creates a stat for the character
      Parameters:
      statName - is the name of the stat.
      minValue - is the lowest value the stat can have.
      maxValue - is the highest value the stat can have.

    • addStat

      public void addStat​(String statName, int minValue, int maxValue, int startingValue)
      For creating a stat and giving it a value in one function
      Parameters:
      statName - The name of the stat, case-sensitive!!
      minValue - The lowest value the stat can have
      maxValue - The highest value the stat can have
      startingValue - The value the stat starts with

    • setStat

      public void setStat​(String statName, int value)
      Lets you deice the value of a stat you have already crated.
      Parameters:
      statName - is the name of the stat you are deciding value of.
      value - is the value you are assigning it.

    • setStatGenerationDice

      public void setStatGenerationDice​(String statName, int numOfDice, int diceSides)
      Set the stat to have its value generated with dice
      Parameters:
      statName - is the name of the stat.
      numOfDice - how many dice are used to generate the value.
      diceSides - how many sides does the dice have.

    • setStatGenerationManual

      public void setStatGenerationManual​(String statName)
      Decide that the value of a stat is to be set by the player
      Parameters:
      statName - is the name of the stat.

    • finishCharacter

      public void finishCharacter()
      Write this function when you are done with the character creation. Must be written bellow the other functions. Saves all the options to the file that the screen reads from.
